scripts.titles:verify: npm run titles:gen && npm run titles:check && git diff --exit-code -- lib/titles/titles_ja_1000_universal.ts
scripts.ci:gate: npm run lint && npm run titles:verify && npm run e2e:ci
scripts.ci:gate:log: powershell -NoProfile -Command "node tools\ensure-logs-dir.cjs; npm run ci:gate 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath logs\ci-gate.log"
scripts.ci:gate:log:ts: node tools\run-with-log.cjs ci-gate npm run ci:gate
scripts.e2e:trace:log: powershell -NoProfile -Command "node tools\ensure-logs-dir.cjs; npm run e2e:trace 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath logs\e2e-trace.log"
scripts.e2e:trace:log:ts: node tools\run-with-log.cjs e2e-trace npm run e2e:trace
scripts.dev:api: set NEXT_PUBLIC_DATA_SOURCE=api && set NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000 && npm run dev -- -p 3000
scripts.e2e:ci:raw: node tools\ensure-ports-free.cjs 3103 8001 && concurrently --raw -k -s first -n GUARD,BACK,FRONT,TEST "node tools\\guard-git-head.cjs .." "cd ..\laravel && php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8001" "set NEXT_PUBLIC_DATA_SOURCE=api && set NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8001 && set NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-e2e && npm run dev -- -p 3103" "set E2E_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3103 && set PLAYWRIGHT_API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:8001 && npx wait-on --verbose --interval 250 --timeout 90000 tcp:8001 http-get://127.0.0.1:3103/home && echo WAIT-ON OK && npx playwright test --reporter=line"
